title: Collected Stories
description: This collection includes following stories:The Events at Poroth Farm (1972)Renaissance Man (1974)S.F. (1975)Petey (1979)Children of the Kingdom (1980)Black Man with a Horn (1980) Well-Connected (1987)The Book of Hieronymus Bosch (1988)One Size Eats All (1993)Growing Things (1999)
author: T.E.D. Klein
